column5: Hi All,  Good morning all! (Can't sleep in these hotel beds, LOL)  I was wondering if anyone will be fishing the whirlpool today.  I'm in Niagara falls today for some work seminars but may have an hour or so of free time, I won't be fishing but was looking to see if any OFNer were around to say "hi" to. I've never fished the whirlpool before and may have my kids with me today.  If you are still fishing around 3 pm to 5 pm, I may look for you.  Stan
Make sure the kids have good shoes for the trek down and back up.  No sandals.  Have a safe trip.

Just seen this one Stan. Hope you are/had, a great day out there,or should I say, down there.HEHE. Great place to fish and all you hear is the water. Very peaceful place to fish. I sure do mis my trips to the pool.
